Summary: Saw object hovering over Lake Harding at around 5 mph then it accelerated away at a very high speed.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Valley
There were no other sightings in Valley on or around November 11th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was making a delivery around 3:30a. I witnessed a triangular wedged shape craft hovering about a residential treeline. The tailend had an orange glow like a light stick you'd find in a sporting goods store. After watching it for around 20 minutes it started to pick up speed and ultimately flew out of site. I saw it again two mornings later around the same time. This is the first time I have reported what I saw.
